title: Quinoa Salad
ingredients: ['200g quinoa', '15g butter', '475ml chicken stock', '1/2 green pepper, diced', '1/2 small red onion, diced', '150g sweetcorn', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained', '4 tablespoons chopped coriander', '1 large tomato, diced', '125ml fresh lime juice or to taste', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon adobo seasoning', '125g feta cheese', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
